headline: Tech Weekly podcast: Sir Tim Berners-Lee on measuring the web
text: This week, Guardian Technology editor Charles Arthur talks to world wide web inventor  and Olympic opening ceremony superstar  Sir Tim Berners-Lee.  We also remember Bill Moggridge, the inventor of the laptop, who died this week at the age of 69.  And Charles digs into the numbers behind Amazon's new Kindle Fire, and we take a look at the latest news in the UK communications data bill debate. Don't forget to...
